name: music-server
description: A means of serving music files over a local network, and a web app to control playback.
author: Ap0c

scripts.build-dev: rm -rf build/site-dev && mkdir -p build/site-dev/js && browserify js/controller.js > build/site-dev/js/app.js -d && cp html/index.html build/site-dev
scripts.build: rm -rf build/site && mkdir -p build/site/js && browserify js/controller.js | uglifyjs > build/site/js/app.js && cp html/index.html build/site
scripts.serve-dev: npm run build-dev && cd build/site-dev && python3 -m http.server
scripts.serve: npm run build && cd build/site && python3 -m http.server
